title: EP 83: Up In Smoke-"The Marijuana Hypocrisy"
itunes:title: EP 83: Up In Smoke-"The Marijuana Hypocrisy"
description:
We had the opportunity to conversate with Virgil Grant, owner of California Cannabis. We discuss how despite being 100% compliant with the local marijuana laws, he was snatched up by the FEDS and served 6 years for operating legal recreational weed spots. Press play to hear how the FEDS don't exactly play fair and how Virgil came back bigger and better.

He also gives some solid advice on how to jump in the multi-,million dollar legal hustle!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
